data.text:
Huu, Haa! Training complete! 
What, it's already this late!? I need to get going!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Huu, Haa! Training complete! 
󠁿What, it's already this late!? I need to get going!

data.text:
Nothing left behind, see ya later, Trainer! I'll be heading to 
the 『Summer Festival Executive Committee』 meeting now～!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Nothing left behind, see ya later, Trainer! I'll be heading to 
󠁿the 『Summer Festival Executive Committee』 meeting now～!

data.text:
Summer Camp was halfway over, and Copano Rickey had been 
extremely busy. To explain why, we have to go back a few days……――
data.processed:
󠁿Summer Camp was halfway over, and Copano Rickey had been 
󠁿extremely busy. To explain why, we have to go back a few days……――

data.text:
It seems like the head of the Summer Festival Executive 
Committee is a fan. They wanted Feng Shui advice 
about the construction they'll be doing!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿It seems like the head of the Summer Festival Executive 
󠁿Committee is a fan. They wanted Feng Shui advice 
󠁿about the construction they'll be doing!

data.text:
To be more specific, it sounds like they want 
me to attend several of the meetings held during 
the week and give them Feng Shui advice.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿To be more specific, it sounds like they want 
󠁿me to attend several of the meetings held during 
󠁿the week and give them Feng Shui advice.

data.text:
They said 『Using Sensei's knowledge, please help the festival 
become a place of good fortune』 and were really passionate～! It 
made me really happy!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿They said 『Using Sensei's knowledge, please help the festival 
󠁿become a place of good fortune』 and were really passionate～! It 
󠁿made me really happy!

data.text:
If it's okay with Trainer, I want to accept 
this request…… What do you think? Is it okay? 
It's okay, isn't it? Right? Right, right!?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿If it's okay with Trainer, I want to accept 
󠁿this request…… What do you think? Is it okay? 
󠁿It's okay, isn't it? Right? Right, right!?

data.text:
……I had some misgivings but, if it's just a few days during the 
week then she should still be able to get some rest too.
data.processed:
󠁿……I had some misgivings but, if it's just a few days during the 
󠁿week then she should still be able to get some rest too.

data.text:
Above all, if she's this enthusiastic, then I think 
I should be the one pushing her forward.
data.processed:
󠁿Above all, if she's this enthusiastic, then I think 
󠁿I should be the one pushing her forward.

data.text: Alright! Thank you, Trainer!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: 󠁿Alright! Thank you, Trainer!

data.text:
And with that, she started doing both her training and 
Summer Festival Executive Committee (Feng Shui Advisor) roles.
data.processed:
󠁿And with that, she started doing both her training and 
󠁿Summer Festival Executive Committee (Feng Shui Advisor) roles.

data.text:
A few days out of the week, after training was over she would 
head to the Executive Committee meetings. Her days were a little 
busy but, they seemed to be proceeding smoothly. However――
data.processed:
󠁿A few days out of the week, after training was over she would 
󠁿head to the Executive Committee meetings. Her days were a little 
󠁿busy but, they seemed to be proceeding smoothly. However――

data.text: Fuaaah……! Good morning, Trainer.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: 󠁿Fuaaah……! Good morning, Trainer.

data.text:
Hmmm, a little! There were some materials I wanted to prepare for 
the next meeting. Before I noticed, it was getting light out and 
Tarumae got mad at me.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Hmmm, a little! There were some materials I wanted to prepare for 
󠁿the next meeting. Before I noticed, it was getting light out and 
󠁿Tarumae got mad at me.

data.text:
Not getting enough sleep can draw in bad luck, 
so normally I'm careful about that but……it seems 
like I was a little too enthusiastic!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Not getting enough sleep can draw in bad luck, 
󠁿so normally I'm careful about that but……it seems 
󠁿like I was a little too enthusiastic!

data.text:
Well-……you see, actually they wanted 
to hold another meeting today.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Well-……you see, actually they wanted 
󠁿to hold another meeting today.

data.text:
Well, you know how I'm the type to keep pressing forward? Before 
I realized it, I went from 『Feng Shui Advisor』 to 『Executive 
Committee Head #2』 I guess.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Well, you know how I'm the type to keep pressing forward? Before 
󠁿I realized it, I went from 『Feng Shui Advisor』 to 『Executive 
󠁿Committee Head #2』 I guess.

data.text:
As I got involved in more and more parts of the project…… 
I suddenly needed to start preparing more things!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿As I got involved in more and more parts of the project…… 
󠁿I suddenly needed to start preparing more things!

data.text:
Ah, but you don't have to worry! I'll finish 
the training, I'm an Uma Musume after all, I 
won't collapse just from something like this!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, but you don't have to worry! I'll finish 
󠁿the training, I'm an Uma Musume after all, I 
󠁿won't collapse just from something like this!

data.text:
And you know, even though it's busy I'm having fun! When I think 
of all the people smiling at the summer festival, I can feel 
power welling up from within～!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿And you know, even though it's busy I'm having fun! When I think 
󠁿of all the people smiling at the summer festival, I can feel 
󠁿power welling up from within～!

data.text:
Oh that's right! Yesterday, we decided on a new 
design for the coats! They incorporated my Feng 
Shui advice and it looks really good!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Oh that's right! Yesterday, we decided on a new 
󠁿design for the coats! They incorporated my Feng 
󠁿Shui advice and it looks really good!

data.text:
On top of that, we changed the portable shrine colors to be more 
lucky, added some lucky decorations, set up a special 
stage……anyways, it'll be on another level from a normal festival!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿On top of that, we changed the portable shrine colors to be more 
󠁿lucky, added some lucky decorations, set up a special 
󠁿stage……anyways, it'll be on another level from a normal festival!

data.text:
Her eyes were sparkling as she spoke about the Summer Festival. 
She had prepared a large amount of materials, and it seemed like 
she had put a lot of passion in to it.

choices.text: (I can't tell her 『You need to stop』……!)
choices.processed: <size=40>(I can't tell her 『You need to stop』……!)</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Her eyes were sparkling as she spoke about the Summer Festival. 
󠁿She had prepared a large amount of materials, and it seemed like 
󠁿she had put a lot of passion in to it.

data.text:
If I can't stop her, then I just need to properly support her. I 
spent the days racking my brain to figure out how to make sure 
this summer ended without issues.
data.processed:
󠁿If I can't stop her, then I just need to properly support her. I 
󠁿spent the days racking my brain to figure out how to make sure 
󠁿this summer ended without issues.

data.text:
Eh? Breakfast? For me……oh, waaa, it's a lucky menu～! Short-necked 
clam miso soup, spinach cooked in soy sauce, and such 
glossy-looking rice……!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Eh? Breakfast? For me……oh, waaa, it's a lucky menu～! Short-necked 
󠁿clam miso soup, spinach cooked in soy sauce, and such 
󠁿glossy-looking rice……!

data.text:
Miso soup is the ultimate fortune food, the clam can sharpen 
intuition, and green-leafed vegetables give it a healthy look! 
This rice is for economic fortune! Trainer, did you know!?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Miso soup is the ultimate fortune food, the clam can sharpen 
󠁿intuition, and green-leafed vegetables give it a healthy look! 
󠁿This rice is for economic fortune! Trainer, did you know!?

data.text:
Haa, haa……! Finished my run! 
Trainer, what's next up for training?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Haa, haa……! Finished my run! 
󠁿Trainer, what's next up for training?

data.text:
Eh, again? 
It feels like we're taking more than usual though……
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Eh, again? 
󠁿It feels like we're taking more than usual though……

data.text: Is it? ……well, I guess so!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: 󠁿Is it? ……well, I guess so!

data.text:
Huuu-…… today's meeting is over! ……But, just a little more. Once 
I get back I need to wash the decorations for the tents again!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Huuu-…… today's meeting is over! ……But, just a little more. Once 
󠁿I get back I need to wash the decorations for the tents again!

data.text:
Huh, Trainer!? Why are you driving that car!? 
Are you perhaps……picking me up!?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Huh, Trainer!? Why are you driving that car!? 
󠁿Are you perhaps……picking me up!?

data.text: ……Really?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: 󠁿……Really?

data.text:
…………Oh, I see! In that case, 
I'll take you up on that offer. ……Ehehe.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿…………Oh, I see! In that case, 
󠁿I'll take you up on that offer. ……Ehehe.

data.text:
And like this, the days where I supported her from the shadows 
continued…… Until the day of the Summer Festival.
data.processed:
󠁿And like this, the days where I supported her from the shadows 
󠁿continued…… Until the day of the Summer Festival.

data.text: (Hyuuuuuuu～……BOOM!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Hyuuuuuuu～……BOOM!)

data.text:
…………Yeah, yeah yeah yeah! This liveliness, everyone's smiling 
faces! Isn't this a huge success!?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿…………Yeah, yeah yeah yeah! This liveliness, everyone's smiling 
󠁿faces! Isn't this a huge success!?

data.text:
We placed lucky items everywhere after all, there 
don't seem to be any issues physically or spiritually! 
Fufuu, I'm glad I worked hard～!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿We placed lucky items everywhere after all, there 
󠁿don't seem to be any issues physically or spiritually! 
󠁿Fufuu, I'm glad I worked hard～!

data.text:
The Summer Festival venue had plenty of heart-warming lanterns, 
colorful tents, and brightly-colored coats, just looking around 
it seemed like the place was tailor-made to make people excited.
data.processed:
󠁿The Summer Festival venue had plenty of heart-warming lanterns, 
󠁿colorful tents, and brightly-colored coats, just looking around 
󠁿it seemed like the place was tailor-made to make people excited.

data.text:
Yeah! 
Ah, but……that's what I want to say to you.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah! 
󠁿Ah, but……that's what I want to say to you.

data.text:
Ahaha! Oh come on, are you still going to play dumb? You were 
watching over me to make sure I didn't overexert myself, right!?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Ahaha! Oh come on, are you still going to play dumb? You were 
󠁿watching over me to make sure I didn't overexert myself, right!?

data.text:
Preparing my meals, adjusting the training, driving 
me to and from…… I noticed. Even though as a trainer 
you're pretty busy already, thank you.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Preparing my meals, adjusting the training, driving 
󠁿me to and from…… I noticed. Even though as a trainer 
󠁿you're pretty busy already, thank you.

data.text:
And also! The thing I'm most thankful for, 
is for you watching over me from the shadows.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿And also! The thing I'm most thankful for, 
󠁿is for you watching over me from the shadows.

data.text:
With you watching over me like that, 
just with that……I felt really relieved!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿With you watching over me like that, 
󠁿just with that……I felt really relieved!

data.text:
If I ever reached my limit physically or mentally, I was sure 
you'd be there to stop me. That even in the worst case, you'd be 
there to catch me if I fell. That's why……I was fine!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿If I ever reached my limit physically or mentally, I was sure 
󠁿you'd be there to stop me. That even in the worst case, you'd be 
󠁿there to catch me if I fell. That's why……I was fine!

data.text:
Maybe you haven't realized it. But what I realized lately is, 
to me you are……my lucky charm.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Maybe you haven't realized it. But what I realized lately is, 
󠁿to me you are……my lucky charm.

data.text:
Just having you around is making me lucky! 
My life will definitely become more and more wonderful!
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿Just having you around is making me lucky! 
󠁿My life will definitely become more and more wonderful!

data.text:
That's why……you see. From now on, stay by my side, okay? 
Please keep supporting me, okay?
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed:
󠁿That's why……you see. From now on, stay by my side, okay? 
󠁿Please keep supporting me, okay?

data.text: ……okay? Ehehe.
data.name: Copano Rickey
data.processed: 󠁿……okay? Ehehe.

title: To My Dream☆To Me, You Are...?
